statements: SELECT * FROM game_event_schedule
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_time > '12:00:00'
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_time FROM game_event_schedule WHERE notification_sent = TRUE
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM game_event_schedule ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC
SELECT * FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_date >= '2022-02-15' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_time > '18:00' AND notification_sent = FALSE ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_date < '2022-03-01' AND notification_sent = TRUE ORDER BY event_time;
SELECT event_name AS 'Event Title', event_date AS 'Date', event_time AS 'Time' FROM game_event_schedule WHERE event_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_events ORDER BY event_datetime DESC
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM game_events WHERE event_location='New York'
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM event_notifications WHERE notification_id < 10
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM game_events WHERE event_name LIKE 'Magic%'
SELECT event_id, event_datetime FROM game_events WHERE event_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM game_events ORDER BY event_datetime DESC
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM game_events WHERE event_datetime > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT event_name, event_location, notification_message FROM game_events INNER JOIN event_notifications ON game_events.event_id = event_notifications.event_id
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%basketball%' ORDER BY event_datetime ASC

SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS notification_count FROM game_events LEFT JOIN event_notifications ON game_events.event_id = event_notifications.event_id GROUP BY event_name HAVING notification_count > 1
SELECT * FROM GameEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM GameEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventParticipants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM GameEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT notification_message FROM Notifications WHERE event_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM GameEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM GameEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM GameEvents WHERE event_location LIKE '%Stadium%';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(participant_id) as participants_count FROM GameEvents ge JOIN EventParticipants ep ON ge.event_id = ep.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT e.event_name, n.notification_message FROM GameEvents e LEFT JOIN Notifications n ON e.event_id = n.event_id;
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_time > '18:00:00';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 3;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM game_events WHERE event_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT * FROM event_participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM game_events WHERE event_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events WHERE event_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM event_participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC;
SELECT user_name, receive_notifications FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_notification_time IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM event_notifications WHERE notification_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT participant_name FROM event_participants WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM community_members WHERE member_email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM game_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM game_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, participant_name FROM game_events JOIN event_participants ON game_events.event_id = event_participants.event_id;
SELECT event_name, notification_message FROM game_events JOIN event_notifications ON game_events.event_id = event_notifications.event_id WHERE notification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, notification_setting FROM community_members JOIN member_preferences ON community_members.member_id = member_preferences.member_id WHERE notification_setting = TRUE;
